item.description:
This month, we're hoping to have a Microsoft representative stop by to talk to us about Windows Phone and the Windows Mobile 7 OS. We're back to our regular time/day (4th Wednesday of the month) and location (Tavern in the Square, Central Square), agenda as follows:

6:00pm to 6:30pm: Refreshments and networking
6:30pm to 7:00pm: Individual introductions to the group
7:00pm to 7:30pm: Job Hunting Tips
- interviewing tips
- what is hot, what is not
- job hunting resources, places to look
7:30 - 8:00pm: More networking!

If you are a hiring manager, recruiter, or entrepreneur you are welcome to bring with you handouts about your company and opened positions. Looking forward to seeing you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: We're in the large function room behind the bar

group.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston (Java, .NET, SQL, LAMP, etc.)

item.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston - Monthly Meetup
